gZm+BA.en:
^3355FFHold it right there!
You're carrying too many items
and don't have enough inventory space to receive any rewards.
Please make more inventory space available and come back to take this challenge.
gZm+BA.pt:

You're carrying too many items
and don't have enough inventory space to receive any rewards.

gpm+BA.en:
[Gimulet]
Hmmm, let's check the
names on the list. Eh...?
Oh, excuse me. If you've
applied for this event before,
please tell me your name.

hpm+BA.en:
[Gimulet]
There you go!
Thank you for participating
and we hope that you enjoy
future events provided by
Cool Event Corp!

iJm+BA.en:
[Raven]
I perform the function of
switching the Cool Event
Corp Employee, [Gimulet],
on or off. The default value
is ON. (^3355FFalberta.gat 148, 60^000000)
